thumb.name: Brighter Days Ahead
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThere are %3Cbr%3EBrighter Days Ahead.%3Cbr%3EJenn%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMy heart leaps%3Cbr%3Ewhen I see%3Cbr%3Ea rainbow in the sky.%3Cbr%3E%3Ci%3EWilliam Wordsworth%3C/i%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEach new day reveals%3Cbr%3Ea world of possibilities%3Cbr%3Ejust waiting for the chance%3Cbr%3Eto fill your heart%3Cbr%3Ewith happiness.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI have faith in you.%3Cbr%3EJenn.

thumb.name: Here in Rainy Times. Too
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJanet...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ERemember I'm here to share%3Cbr%3Ethe rainy times. too.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Sharing the Journey
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E We are companions%3Cbr%3Eof the soul.%3Cbr%3EConnie...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe're two friends.%3Cbr%3Eso different in many ways.%3Cbr%3Eyet both traveling the same path.%3Cbr%3Esearching for the same things.%3Cbr%3Easking the same questions. %3Cbr%3Eand finding a beautiful%3Cbr%3Epart of the answer%3Cbr%3Ein the closeness we share%3Cbr%3Ewith each other... %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm so glad%3Cbr%3Eto be sharing the journey%3Cbr%3Ewith a true friend of the heart%3Cbr%3Elike you.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: During Your Illness
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJessica.%3Cbr%3ESometimes during an illness%3Cbr%3Eit gives strength and comfort%3Cbr%3Eto know how important we are to others.%3Cbr%3ESo this little reminder is for you to tuck away and look at every once in a while.%3Cbr%3Eso that you always know how much you mean%3Cbr%3Eand how much you matter --%3Cbr%3Enot just during this time.%3Cbr%3Ebut every day...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EToday and always.%3Cbr%3Eyou are loved%3Cbr%3Eand valued %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ejust for%3Cbr%3Ethe special person you are.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: We Want to See You Smile
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESmile%3Cbr%3Efor Us.%3Cbr%3EConnie!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOr at least%3Cbr%3Eclench your teeth%3Cbr%3Eand grimace a little.%3Cbr%3EIt's a start.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: How Do I Mail a Snuggle?
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESandy.%3Cbr%3Ewanted to send%3Cbr%3Eyou something%3Cbr%3Eso you'd know%3Cbr%3EI really believe%3Cbr%3Ein you...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...but how do you %3Cbr%3Email a snuggle?%3Cbr%3E
